T04sanss06u:466: yathārūpeṇâsya glānyena jīvitântarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣântarāyo vā tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittam upasthāpya pratinisevyānîti
T04sanss06u:469: hrīrapatrāpyakāpair niḥ ... [[DOUBT]] pracchādanârthaṃ tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanârtham imāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣâsurasya lokasya caityam iti
T04sanss06u:477: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇy āryamārgasaṃbhārânukūlānîti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā nâikakṣaṇam api sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāmêti //
T04sanss06u:479: ye punas te kāśyapa vaidaryâsaṃyatêtaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmād uddhurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti /
T04sanss06u:482: tatra kāśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante ādīptacailā*ādīptaśīrṣâdīptapātrâdīptâsanâdīptaśayanāḥ /
T04sanss06u:483: yaḥ kaścit tatra teṣām upabhogaparibhogaḥ sa sarvâdīptaḥ saṃprajvalitâikajvālībhūtaḥ /
T04sanss06u:484: tatra taiḥ śramaṇavarṇarūpeṇa duṣkhāṃ vedanām anubhavantîti //
T04sanss06u:487: yadi bhaved abhyavakāśiko bodhisatvo glānakāyo 'pratibalakāyas tena vihārakṣitenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanss06u:490: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā vihārasyâiva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi /
T04sanss06u:491: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhim utpādayāmi nâdhyavasānaṃ /
T04sanss06u:493: kartavyo dānapatīnām anugraho nâsmābhir ātmambharibhir bhavitavyam iti //
T04sanss06u:495: te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
T04sanss06u:496: pādasyôpari pādam ādhāya cīvaraiḥ asaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
T04sanss06u:499: na pārśvasukham anytra yāvad evâiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye jāpanāyai /
T04sanss06u:500: ity anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ satvârtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ /
T04sanss06u:509: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogâcārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite /
T04sanss06u:512: na punar aprāptaphalâikapiṇḍapātam api śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ //
T04sanss06u:515: sādhu sādhu kulaputrâivaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokâvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate //
T04sanss06u:520: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogâcāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī /
T04sanss06u:521: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anātmâdhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇâbhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta /
T04sanss06u:523: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ
T04sanss06u:528: agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yêyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ /
T04sanss06u:529: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyâpramāṇaṃ
T04sanss06u:530: cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas tasya dāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyakriyāvipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
T04sanss06u:531: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣayêti //
T04sanss06u:532: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanârambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakânugrahe /
T04sanss06u:537: tatrâpi tāvad imāṃ trisamayarājôktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayârtham uccārayet /
T04sanss06u:547: athavā tathāgatahṛdayam aṣṭasahastraṃ japet salaukikalokôttaramaṇḍalapraviṣṭo bhavati /
T04sanss06u:561: ayam eva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ*mārâdibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭebhyaḥ karoti /
T04sanss06u:562: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapair udakena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā sīmābandhaṃ karoti //
T04sanss06u:566: vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharmapustake vā samāhito nivedayet //
T04sanss06u:568: buddhabodhisatvâlambanena sarvasatvârthâbhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ /
T04sanss06u:575: adhimukticaryā śikṣāpadeṣv acalasya nirvicikitsasya duḥśīlapūrvasyâpi sidhyati /
T04sanss06u:579: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet /
T04sanss06u:580: vicikitsā nâiva kartavyā tasyêdaṃ sidhyati dhruvam /
T04sanss06u:582: bodhicittadṛḍhatā câtra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamârtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya //
T04sanss06u:587: tathā kuto mamâlpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ /
T04sanss06u:588: na câtikrāntadurgater utsāhôrmibahulasyôpacitâprameyapuṇyaskandhasya bhūmipraviṣṭasyâyaṃ pūrvôkto doṣaḥ saṃbhavati /
T04sanss06u:589: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nâdhikâkṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti /
T04sanss06u:592: kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvôtsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyâvicārataḥ pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihâiva yathêṣṭasiddhiś ca bhavati //
T04sanss06u:604: namo 'stu te 'grôgraśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrôttame svāhā //
T04sanss06u:619: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭâbhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya //
T04sanss06u:642: yêmāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate /
T04sanss06u:644: yaś câinaṃ ahir daśati saptadhâsya sphuṭen mūrddhârjakasyêva mañjarī //
T04sanss06u:645: yêmāṃ vidyāṃ dhārayati sa yāvajjīvam ahinā na daśyate /
T04sanss06u:647: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni yatkāraṇaṃ sarpo mriyate //
T04sanss06u:678: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathâvitathânanyathābhūtaṃ satyam aviparītam aviparyastaṃ /
T04sanss06u:708: rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvôpāye sôpasargebhyaḥ svāhā //
T04sanss06u:721: imām api vidyām anantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ vidyādharapiṭakôpanibaddhāṃ sarvabhayarakṣârthaṃ prayuñjīta //
T04sanss06u:735: namo sabbasammasaṃbuddhāṇaṃ sijjhantu me mantapadāḥ svāhā //
T04sanss06u:741: tatra yadi vismṛtya paradravyam ātmabharaṇatṛṣṇayā paribhuṅkte kliṣṭâpattim āpadyate /
T04sanss06u:742: atha vitṛṣṇo anyāsakto vā satvakāryam anusmṛtya bhuṅkte na kliṣṭām āpattim āpadyate /
T04sanss06u:745: satvasvāmikais tu bhogaiḥ satvasvāmikâivâtmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣatêty adoṣaḥ /
T04sanss06u:746: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyam asti yena varteta //
T04sanss06u:749: na câikântasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam ananujñāpyâpi bhuñjānasya kaści-
T04sanss06u:752: nâpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyântike kasyacid viditavṛttântasyâpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittâparijñānāt //
T04sanss06u:753: na câtra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ /
T04sanss06u:754: sarvôtsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhôktyā pratipāditaḥ /
T04sanss06u:756: tasya spaṣṭâvabodhârtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svârthâpekṣayêti //
